H0.text: Which large American bird (Gymnogyps) has been reintroduced to the wild after breeding in captivity in 1991. Condor

H1.text: Which large American bird (Gymnogyps) has been reintroduced to the wild after breeding in captivity in 1991. Eagle

H2.text: Which large American bird (Gymnogyps) has been reintroduced to the wild after breeding in captivity in 1991. Vulture

H3.text: Which large American bird (Gymnogyps) has been reintroduced to the wild after breeding in captivity in 1991. Gymnogyps

A4.text: Numbers rose through captive breeding, and beginning in 1991, condors were reintroduced into the wild.

A5.text: The California condor (Gymnogyps californianus) is a New World vulture.
